lejos.nxt.remote

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.nxt.remote.FileInfo

  • public class FileInfo
extends Object
    Structure that gives information about a leJOS NXJ file.

    • Field Summary

      byte fileHandle
      The handle for accessing the file.
